sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home(props) { return ( <>

Free Database By Dharmendra Bahubali

Dharmendra welcomes you here on Free Database API, you can use this for managing data into your static web pages Also inside it we provide a complete guideline about how to use our services.

props.page("Auth","RegisterPage")} className="lg:pt-12 pt-6 w-full md:w-4/12 px-4 text-center cursor-pointer">
Create New Account
